title: Oster Air Fryer Oven, 10-in-1 Countertop Toaster, Large Enough for 2 Pizzas, Stainless Steel French Doors, XL Sized
description: This 10-in-1 Oster Air Fryer Oven provides a combination of elegance and functionality with its stainless steel French Doors design. Housing a toaster, rotisserie, and air fryer all in one, this extra-large capacity appliance is ideal for large families and can fit up to a 15 x 12 baking pan, a full-sized chicken, or two 16 pizzas. It boasts of 10 different cooking functions, including Air Fry, Slow Cook, Bake, and more, providing precision with its digital controls for temperature and time. Its smart design helps reduce cooking time by up to 35% and uses 50% less energy than conventional ovens.
